author: John Bowden
title: US coronavirus death toll surpasses 40,000
description: The death toll from coronavirus in the U.S. surpassed 40,000 on Sunday.A nationwide tally ...
content:
The death toll from coronavirus in the U.S. surpassed 40,000 on Sunday.
A nationwide tally conducted by Johns Hopkins University indicated that the total number of dead in the U.S. sat at 40,461 as of Sunday evening, while more than 755,000 cases of the viru… [+1726 chars]
